name: Plagueheart Gloves

Plagueheart GlovesLevel 60

Mataus the Wrathcaster at Light's Hope Chapel in the Eastern Plaguelands will make Plagueheart Gloves if you bring him the following: 1 Desecrated Gloves, 8 Wartorn Cloth Scraps and 4 Mooncloth.

Requirements:
- Desecrated Gloves
- Wartorn Cloth Scrap x 8
- Mooncloth x 4
